method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
Rinse the cooked pasta with cold water to cool it down.
Thread a cherry tomato, a mozzarella ball, and a folded basil leaf onto a skewer.
Repeat with the remaining cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and basil leaves.
In a small bowl, whisk together the balsamic glaze, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle the balsamic glaze mixture over the skewers.
Arrange the skewers on a serving platter and garnish with extra basil leaves, if desired.
Serve as a fun and tasty appetizer at parties or gatherings.
